name: DnuPublish
description: Packages the application into a self-contained directory that can be launched.
author: André Marques de Araújo

inputs.name: projectFileOrFolder
inputs.label: Path to project.json or folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project.json file or the application folder. Defaults to the root of the repository if not provided.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to be passed to the publish command.
